Getting Started

Welcome to the Mintlify documentation. This guide will help you set up your project quickly and efficiently with all the tools you need to get started.

Installation

Run the following command to install the SDK:

npm install @mintlify/sdk

Configuration

Create a configuration file in your project root:

{
  "name": "My Docs",
  "version": "1.0.0"
}

Make sure to restart your dev server after changing the config.
